concept.title: Network interface setup in Windows Vista, 7 and 8

conbody.p: The System properties window ( ) will appear on your screen. Press the Device Manager button located in the left column.
Device Manager window ( ) should appear on your screen. Expand the network adapters sub-menu and double click on the network adapter name (for example Intel(R) PRO/1000 MT Desktop Adapter).
Select the Advanced _fixme_ tab in the Network Adapter Properties _fixme_ window ( ) and set the following properties:

fig.title: Network Adapter Properties _fixme_ window in Windows 7

image.alt: Network Adapter Properties _fixme_ window in Windows 7

conbody.p: This property is necessary to turn on the student computer remotely from the teacher workstation.
conbody.note: It may also be necessary to add Dialog Nibelung into the Windows Firewall list of trusted software, as well as perform appropriate adjustments to other firewall and anti virus software installed on the computer.
